# Spotify for Teens - iOS App

## Project Overview
iOS Swift app that integrates with Spotify Premium APIs to provide a music-only listening experience with enhanced parental controls and content filtering.

## Key Features
- Music browsing and playback only (no videos/clips)
- Stricter parental controls and content filtering
- Integration with Spotify Premium APIs
- Content rating system for filtering explicit/inappropriate content

## Development Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold iOS project structure
- [x] Set up Spotify SDK integration
- [x] Create core app files
- [x] Add configuration files
- [x] Create README documentation

## Technical Stack
- Language: Swift 5.0+
- Platform: iOS 14.0+
- Dependencies: Spotify iOS SDK via CocoaPods
- Architecture: MVC pattern with custom content filtering layer
